means.word_mean: 1. the ability to sense the position and location and orientation and movement of the body and its parts

auth_sentence.content: Proprioception This is the ability to sense where the body is in space and how it is moving without looking.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Proprioception This is the ability to sense where the body is in space and how it is moving without looking.
